Test: public void testShortOptionalArgValue() { String[] args = new String[] { "-e", "everything" }; try { CommandLineParser parser = new PosixParser(); CommandLine cmd = parser.parse(opts,args); } catch (ParseException e) { fail("Cannot setUp() CommandLine: " + e.toString()); } }
Code: public boolean hasOption(String opt) { return options.contains( resolveOption(opt)); }
